long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Helix Rock Radio your home for online rock from the 90s, 00 and 2010s.

Helix Rock Radio is the brainchild of Brandon as a way to have a great radio station to listen to all the time. Brandon, an avid audiophile, podcaster, streamer, and radio enthusiast, wanted to mesh music and podcasting into one making Helix Rock Radio.

The mission of Helix Rock Radio is to bring genuine and great rock radio online in a different way. The station will be a lively entertaining mix of chat and rock music of the last fifty years. And, of course, we’ll have plenty of fun. We will forge relationships with the listeners and provide a trusted friend and an engaging and entertaining platform for all.

Our mission at Helix Rock Radio is to be that radio station that provides you with the best quality music and talk radio online.
